body:
Mediation usually takes place face-to-face with the other parent over several sessions. Each session lasts about 90 minutes.

You can choose to have mediation:

- in the same room
- in different rooms (shuttle mediation)
- on different days
- with your children (family mediation)
- with a lawyer (lawyer-assisted mediation)
cost: Average cost of mediation per person
cost_description: Estimated cost based on an average of __3__ sessions. Fees may vary depending on your location and the experience of the mediator. Some mediators offer reductions if you’re unemployed or on a low income.
heading: Attend mediation sessions
